data.title: Nuke Design System
data.tagline: Element-first CSS design system with web components
data.problem: Design systems force all-or-nothing adoption. Users can't customize tokens without forking.
data.solution: Split architecture: core logic stays in node_modules, theme files copy to user's project for full customization.
philosophy: Element-first: style native HTML elements, not wrapper components
Theme files are user-owned, core logic is package-owned
Progressive enhancement: works without JS, web components add interactivity
